definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: His rare gifts and bold strategy are universally acknowledged.
sentences.chinese: 他的雄才大略是举世公认的。

sentences.english: As a great intelligent and capable emperor, Han Wudi had made many more achievements than mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 汉武帝一生雄才大略，他的功绩远远大于他的过失。

sentences.english: Without great willpower, could not have rare gifts and bold strategy.
sentences.chinese: 没有伟大的意志力，就不可能有雄才大略。

sentences.english: King Wuding appreciated Fu's great talent and bold vision.
sentences.chinese: 武丁特别欣赏傅说的雄才大略。

sentences.english: Only the opportunity can offer you the display stage.
sentences.chinese: 有了机遇，才有施展雄才大略的舞台。

definition: to lead military operations with extraordinary skill
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to bring peace and stability to the country
expert at appointing people according to their abilities (idiom)/to put the right people in the right places
